'''14w10b''' is the fifteenth [[snapshot]] for [[Java Edition 1.8]], released on March 6, 2014,<ref>{{cite|url=https://web.archive.org/web/20140307083916/https://mojang.com/2014/03/minecraft-snapshot-14w10a/|title=Minecraft snapshot 14w10a|date=March 6, 2014|website=Mojang.com|author=[[Dinnerbone]]}}</ref> to fix some of the bugs and crashes in the [[14w10a]] snapshot.

== Fixes ==
{{fixes|fixedin=14w10b|prefix=Minecraft
|;old
|4410|Floating in 3rd person while [[sneaking]].
|32284|Placing an enchanted item with a non-existent ench ID will crash when placing it in the first slot of an [[anvil]].
|;dev
|48461|[[Brewing stand]]s do not copy their [[NBT]].
|48539|[[Vine]]s briefly display [[missing model]] when breaking supporting block.
|50155|[[Crop]]s float above [[farmland]].
|;prev
|50220|"[[Nether Brick Fence]]" is not rendered correctly in [[inventory]].
|50222|[[Dirt]] texture on [[Grass Block]]s is green.
|50223|14w10a dedicated server crash at startup.
|50226|[[Jukebox]] is missing the textures when [[disc]] is inside.
|50229|{{cmd|scoreboard team option deathMessageVisibility}} error message lists wrong options when ran without <code>option</code> parameter.
|50232|[[Wheat]] appears as purple and black checker box.
|50233|[[Double Stone Slab]]s have the "missing texture" texture.
|50241|Cannot add or set scores of offline or "fake" players.
|50242|Powered [[Repeater]]s don't emit flame [[particle]]s around [[torch]]es.
|50246|[[Bed]]s legs are missing when there is a [[chest]] to the left or right of bed, with a solid block on opposite side.
|50250|Texture of [[nether wart]] is broken.
|50254|Full [[snow]] layer block has a missing model/texture.
|50259|Upward facing dispenser texture bug.
|50267|<code>Hopper: java.lang.ClassCastException: atf cannot be cast to aoc</code>.
|50270|<code>Hopper: java.lang.ClassCastException: atf cannot be cast to arj</code>.
|50273|<code>Hopper: java.lang.ArrayIndexOutOfBoundsException: -1</code>.
|50284|{{cmd|scoreboard players set FAKEPLAYER}} not working (14w10A, not B).
|50287|Going back to a previously held map after a crash crashes the game again.
}}</onlyinclude>

== Trivia ==
* 14w10b was previously removed from the [[launcher]] for some time, but was added back in September 2018.
